markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tree's Ward](/Feats.aspx?ID=3952) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 38</row>

</column>

---

You've lived among trees for so long they recognize your presence and seek to protect you from harm. You can cast [_protector tree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=976) as a primal innate spell once per day.
name: Tree's Ward
